These are false ideas that TV and movies show, but they might make girls feel that they are not like scientists, and think that science is not an interesting job choice. If girls saw more positive examples of women in science, it would give them more confidence and make them feel like they belong in those subjects.

original: Don't always follow positive feedback with negative feedback. When positive and negative feedback always appear to go hand in hand, the positives can become devalued and ignored. simplified: Don't always give negative feedback after positive feedback. When good and bad comments always come together, people stop believing the good comments and ignore them.
